actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution to continue programs, transactions, and activities with respect to the Republic of China to the same extent and in the same manner as provided in the memorandum of the President, dated December 31, 1978, pending further legislation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to continue relations with the Republic of China, as provided in the December 30, 1978, Executive memorandum, until Congress enacts specific legislation providing for unofficial relations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to continue programs, transactions, and activities with respect to the Republic of China to the same extent and in the same manner as provided in the memorandum of the President, dated December 31, 1978, pending further legislation, and for other purposes.
